description: Request body of the exchange one-time-token endpoint.

token.description: The token previously obtained with the 'generate one-time-token' endpoint.

client_id.description: The OAuth2 client_id. This client will be associated with the generated token.

activateUser.description: Activate the user if the token was valid.

dontExpire.description: Don't expire the one-time-token even if it was correct.
